pages.text: While you're figuring out why $(c_brown)brown$() still eludes you, why not automate those saplings?$(br2)The $(thing)Pigment Extractor$() slowly gives you the relevant pigment (and occasionally more saplings!) of whatever colored sapling you put in.

pages.title: Recipe
pages.text: Use $(item)Vegetal$() or $(item)Bone Meal$() to speed up the process.
